defaultValue.description: The initial value of the segmented control.

disabled.description: If `true`, the segmented control will be disabled.

fullRounded.description: If `true`, the segmented control will be full rounded.

items.description: If provided, generate segmented control buttons but based on items.

name.description: The HTML `name` attribute used for forms.

onChange.description: The callback fired when any children radio is checked or unchecked.

orientation.description: The orientation of the segmented control.

readOnly.description: If `true`, the segmented control will be readonly.

value.description: The value of the segmented control.
